attributes.action: Award Ross Kemp (actor) an OBE for his serves to British Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for people to show support for Ross Kemp. Mr Kemp has, over the passed 5 years, created with his production team 2 series of TV programme that have shown British Forces at their best. MR Kemp has made my public aware of the way in which our boys and girls are working extremely hard for the people of Afganistan. The least this deserves ia an OBE.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
